about_the_game:
"Seeing how serious her mother was about keeping it a secret made Mira understand just how sensitive what she was about to tell her was. 'I promise,' Mira said solemnly."

With a variety of gameplay mechanics, venture through Mira's fantasy world filled with atmosphere and adventure, and pursue her inner peace. Uncover her past with the help of written books; witness events before she embarked.

In the daytime, travel through nature and man-made ruins; pass through magic gates with the aid of a mana-filled staff. In the nighttime, experience the horror of Mira's short nightmares.



  • A highly immersive game with a running time of over three hours
  • A raging storyline of ever-increasing excitement
  • Varied gameplay mechanics with light puzzle and platforming elements that may challenge some players from time to time
  • Charming soundtrack composed by Peter Gunder, and guest vocals by Pınar Karabaş
  • Atmospheric sound design to carry the player through the highs and lows of their journey
  • "God Mode" option for a more casual gameplay experience

Save progression: The game saves progress each time you start a new level or disenchant a new gate.

PS: The core aspect of this game is the atmosphere. It is recommended for those who mostly seek to experience the mood.

content_descriptors.notes: Some gore is seen in a part of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 or AMD RADEON RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4.1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: This game needs all Windows updates installed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4.1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Headphones & SSD are recommended. For additional immersion use gamepad with force feedback.
